name: Would You Rather Dirty & Evil
description:
Would you rather is a drinking game, created for party animals, teens, college students, college dropouts, bachelorettes and all the other party people that want to drink to start their night.

Game can be played offline, without WIFI, and it consists of a bunch of cards you read to your friends. It's a perfect game against your sobriety.

We made this game because you and your friends are boring and you can’t come up with funny stuff that gets you drunk yourself.

-----! FEATURES !-----

- 850+ Cards
- 8 Packs
- Hours of getting to know your friends
- For 2 players minimum
- Hours of fun
- Hating your friends and humanity in the end
- Public embarrassment and disappointment

-----! HOW TO PLAY !-----


- Gather your „friends“
- Read the cards
- Everybody votes who would do what
- People who voted for option with less votes are losers and they have to drink. If only one person voted for an option they are a mega loser and they have to drink double.
- The losing voters drink. If there is a draw, everybody drinks. If only one person drinks, they drink double.

"All of my friends are horrible human beings and I can't look them in the eye anymore but it was fun so I guess it was worth it"
